compatibility.notes: The CC-BY-NC-SA-2.0 license allows for non-commercial use and requires attribution. Any derivative works must also be licensed under the same terms, which may affect compatibility with more restrictive licenses.

key_requirements: Provide appropriate credit to the original author.
Indicate if changes were made to the original work.
Distribute derivative works under the same license.
license.name: CC-BY-NC-SA-2.0
obligations: Attribution must be given to the original author.
The work cannot be used for commercial purposes.
Any derivative works must be licensed under the same terms (ShareAlike).
The license must be included with any distributed copies or adaptations of the work.
